BugInstance.message: org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.oracle.ddl.OracleAlterViewStatement.setConstraintDefinition(ConstraintDefinitionSegment) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into OracleAlterViewStatement.constraintDefinition
